name: UNO
description: A classic card matching game where players race to empty their hands.
basicRules: Each player starts with 7 cards
Match cards by color, number, or symbol
Say 'UNO' when you have one card left
First player to empty their hand wins

name: Charades
description: A classic acting game where players guess words or phrases through mime.
basicRules: Write words/phrases on paper slips
Players take turns acting without speaking
Team members guess within time limit
Points awarded for correct guesses

name: Monopoly
description: A property trading board game where players buy, rent, and develop properties.
basicRules: Players move around the board buying properties
Collect rent from other players
Build houses and hotels to increase rent
Last player remaining wins

name: Two Truths and a Lie
description: A getting-to-know-you game where players guess which statement is false.
basicRules: Each player thinks of two true statements and one false one
Players take turns sharing their three statements
Others guess which statement is the lie
Reveal the correct answer and share stories

name: Texas Hold'em Poker
description: A strategic card game involving betting, bluffing, and hand rankings.
basicRules: Each player gets 2 hole cards
5 community cards are dealt in stages
Players make the best 5-card hand
Betting rounds determine the winner

name: Scavenger Hunt
description: A searching game where teams find items or complete tasks from a list.
basicRules: Create a list of items to find or tasks to complete
Divide into teams
Set time limit and boundaries
Team finding most items wins
